511 //*************************************************************************************************
516 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
517  , size_t M // Number of rows
518  , size_t N // Number of columns
519  , bool SO > // Storage order
520 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::HybridMatrix()
521  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
522  , m_( 0UL ) // The current number of rows of the matrix
523  , n_( 0UL ) // The current number of columns of the matrix
524 {
525  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || NN == N );
526 
527  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
528  for( size_t i=0UL; i<M*NN; ++i )
529  v_[i] = Type();
530  }
531 
532  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
533 }

550 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
551  , size_t M // Number of rows
552  , size_t N // Number of columns
553  , bool SO > // Storage order
554 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::HybridMatrix( size_t m, size_t n )
555  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
556  , m_( m ) // The current number of rows of the matrix
557  , n_( n ) // The current number of columns of the matrix
558 {
559  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || NN == N );
560 
561  if( m > M ) {
562  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
563  }
564 
565  if( n > N ) {
566  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
567  }
568 
569  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
570  for( size_t i=0UL; i<M*NN; ++i )
571  v_[i] = Type();
572  }
573 
574  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
575 }

593 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
594  , size_t M // Number of rows
595  , size_t N // Number of columns
596  , bool SO > // Storage order
597 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::HybridMatrix( size_t m, size_t n, const Type& init )
598  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
599  , m_( m ) // The current number of rows of the matrix
600  , n_( n ) // The current number of columns of the matrix
601 {
602  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || NN == N );
603 
604  if( m > M ) {
605  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
606  }
607 
608  if( n > N ) {
609  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
610  }
611 
612  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m; ++i ) {
613  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n; ++j )
614  v_[i*NN+j] = init;
615 
616  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
617  for( size_t j=n; j<NN; ++j )
618  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
619  }
620  }
621 
622  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
623  for( size_t i=m; i<M; ++i )
624  for( size_t j=0UL; j<NN; ++j )
625  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
626  }
627 
628  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
629 }

657 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
658  , size_t M // Number of rows
659  , size_t N // Number of columns
660  , bool SO > // Storage order
661 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::HybridMatrix( initializer_list< initializer_list<Type> > list )
662  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
663  , m_( list.size() ) // The current number of rows of the matrix
664  , n_( determineColumns( list ) ) // The current number of columns of the matrix
665 {
666  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || NN == N );
667 
668  if( m_ > M ) {
669  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
670  }
671 
672  if( n_ > N ) {
673  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
674  }
675 
676  size_t i( 0UL );
677 
678  for( const auto& rowList : list ) {
679  std::fill( std::copy( rowList.begin(), rowList.end(), v_+i*NN ), v_+(i+1UL)*NN, Type() );
680  ++i;
681  }
682 
683  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
684  for( ; i<M; ++i )
685  for( size_t j=0UL; j<NN; ++j )
686  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
687  }
688 
689  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
690 }

725 template< typename Other > // Data type of the initialization array

727  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
728  , m_( m ) // The current number of rows of the matrix

783 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
784  , size_t M // Number of rows
785  , size_t N // Number of columns
786  , bool SO > // Storage order
787 template< typename Other // Data type of the initialization array
788  , size_t M2 // Number of rows of the initialization array
789  , size_t N2 > // Number of columns of the initialization array
790 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::HybridMatrix( const Other (&array)[M2][N2] )
791  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
792  , m_( M2 ) // The current number of rows of the matrix
793  , n_( N2 ) // The current number of columns of the matrix
794 {
795  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( M2 <= M );
796  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( N2 <= N );
797  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || NN == N );
798 
799  for( size_t i=0UL; i<M2; ++i ) {
800  for( size_t j=0UL; j<N2; ++j )
801  v_[i*NN+j] = array[i][j];
802 
803  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
804  for( size_t j=N2; j<NN; ++j )
805  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
806  }
807  }
808 
809  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
810  for( size_t i=M2; i<M; ++i )
811  for( size_t j=0UL; j<NN; ++j )
812  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
813  }
814 
815  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
816 }

871  , bool SO2 > // Storage order of the foreign matrix
872 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::HybridMatrix( const Matrix<MT,SO2>& m )
873  : v_() // The statically allocated matrix elements
874  , m_( (~m).rows() ) // The current number of rows of the matrix
875  , n_( (~m).columns() ) // The current number of columns of the matrix
876 {
877  using blaze::assign;
878 
879  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || NN == N );
880 
881  if( (~m).rows() > M || (~m).columns() > N ) {
882  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid setup of hybrid matrix" );
883  }
884 
885  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i ) {
886  for( size_t j=( IsSparseMatrix<MT>::value ? 0UL : n_ );
887  j<( IsNumeric<Type>::value ? NN : n_ );
888  ++j ) {
889  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
890  }
891  }
892 
893  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
894  for( size_t i=m_; i<M; ++i )
895  for( size_t j=0UL; j<NN; ++j )
896  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
897  }
898 
899  assign( *this, ~m );
900 
901  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
902 }

1268 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1269  , size_t M // Number of rows
1270  , size_t N // Number of columns
1271  , bool SO > // Storage order
1272 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::operator=( const Type& set )
1273 {
1274  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( m_ <= M, "Invalid number of rows detected" );
1275  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( n_ <= N, "Invalid number of columns detected" );
1276 
1277  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
1278  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
1279  v_[i*NN+j] = set;
1280 
1281  return *this;
1282 }

1286 //*************************************************************************************************
1311 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1312  , size_t M // Number of rows
1313  , size_t N // Number of columns
1314  , bool SO > // Storage order
1315 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>&
1316  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::operator=( initializer_list< initializer_list<Type> > list )
1317 {
1318  const size_t m( list.size() );
1319  const size_t n( determineColumns( list ) );
1320 
1321  if( m > M ) {
1322  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
1323  }
1324 
1325  if( n > N ) {
1326  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
1327  }
1328 
1329  resize( m, n, false );
1330 
1331  size_t i( 0UL );
1332 
1333  for( const auto& rowList : list ) {
1334  std::fill( std::copy( rowList.begin(), rowList.end(), v_+i*NN ), v_+(i+1UL)*NN, Type() );
1335  ++i;
1336  }
1337 
1338  return *this;
1339 }

1364 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1365  , size_t M // Number of rows
1366  , size_t N // Number of columns
1367  , bool SO > // Storage order
1368 template< typename Other // Data type of the initialization array
1369  , size_t M2 // Number of rows of the initialization array
1370  , size_t N2 > // Number of columns of the initialization array
1371 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::operator=( const Other (&array)[M2][N2] )
1372 {
1373  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( M2 <= M );
1374  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( N2 <= N );
1375 
1376  resize( M2, N2 );
1377 
1378  for( size_t i=0UL; i<M2; ++i )
1379  for( size_t j=0UL; j<N2; ++j )
1380  v_[i*NN+j] = array[i][j];
1381 
1382  return *this;
1383 }

1395 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1396  , size_t M // Number of rows
1397  , size_t N // Number of columns
1398  , bool SO > // Storage order
1399 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::operator=( const HybridMatrix& rhs )
1400 {
1401  using blaze::assign;
1402 
1403  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( m_ <= M, "Invalid number of rows detected" );
1404  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( n_ <= N, "Invalid number of columns detected" );
1405 
1406  resize( rhs.rows(), rhs.columns() );
1407  assign( *this, ~rhs );
1408 
1409  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
1410 
1411  return *this;
1412 }

1416 //*************************************************************************************************
1427 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1428  , size_t M // Number of rows
1429  , size_t N // Number of columns
1430  , bool SO > // Storage order
1431 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side matrix
1432  , bool SO2 > // Storage order of the right-hand side matrix
1433 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::operator=( const Matrix<MT,SO2>& rhs )
1434 {
1435  using blaze::assign;
1436 
1437  typedef TransExprTrait_<This> TT;
1438  typedef CTransExprTrait_<This> CT;
1439  typedef InvExprTrait_<This> IT;
1440 
1441  if( (~rhs).rows() > M || (~rhs).columns() > N ) {
1442  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid assignment to hybrid matrix" );
1443  }
1444 
1445  if( IsSame<MT,TT>::value && (~rhs).isAliased( this ) ) {
1446  transpose();
1447  }
1448  else if( IsSame<MT,CT>::value && (~rhs).isAliased( this ) ) {
1449  ctranspose();
1450  }
1451  else if( !IsSame<MT,IT>::value && (~rhs).canAlias( this ) ) {
1452  HybridMatrix tmp( ~rhs );
1453  resize( tmp.rows(), tmp.columns() );
1454  assign( *this, tmp );
1455  }
1456  else {
1457  resize( (~rhs).rows(), (~rhs).columns() );
1458  if( IsSparseMatrix<MT>::value )
1459  reset();
1460  assign( *this, ~rhs );
1461  }
1462 
1463  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
1464 
1465  return *this;
1466 }
1467 //*************************************************************************************************
1468 
1469 
1470 //*************************************************************************************************
1480 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1481  , size_t M // Number of rows
1482  , size_t N // Number of columns
1483  , bool SO > // Storage order
1484 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side matrix
1485  , bool SO2 > // Storage order of the right-hand side matrix
1486 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::operator+=( const Matrix<MT,SO2>& rhs )
1487 {
1488  using blaze::addAssign;
1489 
1490  if( (~rhs).rows() != m_ || (~rhs).columns() != n_ ) {
1491  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Matrix sizes do not match" );
1492  }
1493 
1494  if( (~rhs).canAlias( this ) ) {
1495  const ResultType_<MT> tmp( ~rhs );
1496  addAssign( *this, tmp );
1497  }
1498  else {
1499  addAssign( *this, ~rhs );
1500  }
1501 
1502  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
1503 
1504  return *this;
1505 }

1891 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1892  , size_t M // Number of rows
1893  , size_t N // Number of columns
1894  , bool SO > // Storage order
1895 void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::resize( size_t m, size_t n, bool preserve )
1896 {
1897  UNUSED_PARAMETER( preserve );
1898 
1899  if( m > M ) {
1900  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
1901  }
1902 
1903  if( n > N ) {
1904  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
1905  }
1906 
1907  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && n < n_ ) {
1908  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m; ++i )
1909  for( size_t j=n; j<n_; ++j )
1910  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
1911  }
1912 
1913  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && m < m_ ) {
1914  for( size_t i=m; i<m_; ++i )
1915  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
1916  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
1917  }
1918 
1919  m_ = m;
1920  n_ = n;
1921 }

1944 inline void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::extend( size_t m, size_t n, bool preserve )
1945 {
1946  UNUSED_PARAMETER( preserve );
1947  resize( m_+m, n_+n );
1948 }

1952 //*************************************************************************************************
1963 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
1964  , size_t M // Number of rows
1965  , size_t N // Number of columns
1966  , bool SO > // Storage order
1967 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::transpose()
1968 {
1969  using std::swap;
1970 
1971  if( m_ > N || n_ > M ) {
1972  BLAZE_THROW_LOGIC_ERROR( "Impossible transpose operation" );
1973  }
1974 
1975  const size_t maxsize( max( m_, n_ ) );
1976  for( size_t i=1UL; i<maxsize; ++i ) {
1977  for( size_t j=0UL; j<i; ++j ) {
1978  swap( v_[i*NN+j], v_[j*NN+i] );
1979  }
1980  }
1981 
1982  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && m_ < n_ ) {
1983  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i ) {
1984  for( size_t j=m_; j<n_; ++j ) {
1985  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
1986  }
1987  }
1988  }
1989 
1990  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && m_ > n_ ) {
1991  for( size_t i=n_; i<m_; ++i ) {
1992  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j ) {
1993  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
1994  }
1995  }
1996  }
1997 
1998  swap( m_, n_ );
1999 
2000  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
2001 
2002  return *this;
2003 }

2018 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2019  , size_t M // Number of rows
2020  , size_t N // Number of columns
2021  , bool SO > // Storage order
2022 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::ctranspose()
2023 {
2024  using std::swap;
2025 
2026  if( m_ > N || n_ > M ) {
2027  BLAZE_THROW_LOGIC_ERROR( "Impossible transpose operation" );
2028  }
2029 
2030  const size_t maxsize( max( m_, n_ ) );
2031  for( size_t i=0UL; i<maxsize; ++i ) {
2032  for( size_t j=0UL; j<i; ++j ) {
2033  cswap( v_[i*NN+j], v_[j*NN+i] );
2034  }
2035  conjugate( v_[i*NN+i] );
2036  }
2037 
2038  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && m_ < n_ ) {
2039  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i ) {
2040  for( size_t j=m_; j<n_; ++j ) {
2041  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
2042  }
2043  }
2044  }
2045 
2046  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && m_ > n_ ) {
2047  for( size_t i=n_; i<m_; ++i ) {
2048  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j ) {
2049  v_[i*NN+j] = Type();
2050  }
2051  }
2052  }
2053 
2054  swap( m_, n_ );
2055 
2056  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
2057 
2058  return *this;
2059 }

2069 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2070  , size_t M // Number of rows
2071  , size_t N // Number of columns
2072  , bool SO > // Storage order
2073 template< typename Other > // Data type of the scalar value
2074 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::scale( const Other& scalar )
2075 {
2076  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
2077  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
2078  v_[i*NN+j] *= scalar;
2079 
2080  return *this;

2091 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2092  , size_t M // Number of rows
2093  , size_t N // Number of columns
2094  , bool SO > // Storage order
2095 inline void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::swap( HybridMatrix& m ) noexcept
2096 {
2097  using std::swap;
2098 
2099  const size_t maxrows( max( m_, m.m_ ) );
2100  const size_t maxcols( max( n_, m.n_ ) );
2101 
2102  for( size_t i=0UL; i<maxrows; ++i ) {
2103  for( size_t j=0UL; j<maxcols; ++j ) {
2104  swap( v_[i*NN+j], m(i,j) );
2105  }
2106  }
2107 
2108  swap( m_, m.m_ );
2109  swap( n_, m.n_ );
2110 }

2305 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2306  , size_t M // Number of rows
2307  , size_t N // Number of columns
2308  , bool SO > // Storage order
2309 inline bool HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::isIntact() const noexcept
2310 {
2311  if( m_ > M || n_ > N )
2312  return false;
2313 
2314  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value )
2315  {
2316  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i ) {
2317  for( size_t j=n_; j<NN; ++j ) {
2318  if( v_[i*NN+j] != Type() )
2319  return false;
2320  }
2321  }
2322 
2323  for( size_t i=m_; i<M; ++i ) {
2324  for( size_t j=0UL; j<NN; ++j ) {
2325  if( v_[i*NN+j] != Type() )
2326  return false;
2327  }
2328  }
2329  }
2330 
2331  return true;
2332 }

2671 inline DisableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAssign<MT> >
2672  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::assign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO2>& rhs )

2675

2685 //*************************************************************************************************
2696 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2697  , size_t M // Number of rows
2698  , size_t N // Number of columns
2699  , bool SO > // Storage order
2700 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side dense matrix
2701  , bool SO2 > // Storage order of the right-hand side dense matrix
2702 inline EnableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAssign<MT> >
2703  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::assign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO2>& rhs )
2704 {
2705  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_BE_VECTORIZABLE_TYPE( Type );
2706 
2707  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
2708 
2709  constexpr bool remainder( !usePadding || !IsPadded<MT>::value );
2710 
2711  const size_t jpos( ( remainder )?( n_ & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) ):( n_ ) );
2712  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( !remainder || ( n_ - ( n_ % (SIMDSIZE) ) ) == jpos, "Invalid end calculation" );
2713 
2714  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
2715  {
2716  size_t j( 0UL );
2717 
2718  for( ; j<jpos; j+=SIMDSIZE ) {
2719  store( i, j, (~rhs).load(i,j) );
2720  }
2721  for( ; remainder && j<n_; ++j ) {
2722  v_[i*NN+j] = (~rhs)(i,j);
2723  }
2724  }
2725 }

2740 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2741  , size_t M // Number of rows
2742  , size_t N // Number of columns
2743  , bool SO > // Storage order
2744 template< typename MT > // Type of the right-hand side sparse matrix
2745 inline void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::assign( const SparseMatrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
2746 {
2747  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
2748 
2749  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
2750  for( ConstIterator_<MT> element=(~rhs).begin(i); element!=(~rhs).end(i); ++element )
2751  v_[i*NN+element->index()] = element->value();
2752 }

2771 template< typename MT > // Type of the right-hand side sparse matrix
2772 inline void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::assign( const SparseMatrix<MT,!SO>& rhs )
2773 {

2796 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2797  , size_t M // Number of rows
2798  , size_t N // Number of columns
2799  , bool SO > // Storage order
2800 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side dense matrix
2801  , bool SO2 > // Storage order of the right-hand side dense matrix
2802 inline DisableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAddAssign<MT> >
2803  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::addAssign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO2>& rhs )
2804 {
2805  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
2806 
2807  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
2808  {
2809  if( IsDiagonal<MT>::value )
2810  {
2811  v_[i*NN+i] += (~rhs)(i,i);
2812  }
2813  else
2814  {
2815  const size_t jbegin( ( IsUpper<MT>::value )
2816  ?( IsStrictlyUpper<MT>::value ? i+1UL : i )
2817  :( 0UL ) );
2818  const size_t jend ( ( IsLower<MT>::value )
2819  ?( IsStrictlyLower<MT>::value ? i : i+1UL )
2820  :( n_ ) );
2821  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( jbegin <= jend, "Invalid loop indices detected" );
2822 
2823  for( size_t j=jbegin; j<jend; ++j ) {
2824  v_[i*NN+j] += (~rhs)(i,j);
2825  }
2826  }
2827  }
2828 }

2832 //*************************************************************************************************
2843 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
2844  , size_t M // Number of rows
2845  , size_t N // Number of columns
2846  , bool SO > // Storage order
2847 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side dense matrix
2848  , bool SO2 > // Storage order of the right-hand side dense matrix
2849 inline EnableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAddAssign<MT> >
2850  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,SO>::addAssign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO2>& rhs )
2851 {
2852  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_BE_VECTORIZABLE_TYPE( Type );
2853  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_NOT_BE_DIAGONAL_MATRIX_TYPE( MT );
2854 
2855  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
2856 
2857  constexpr bool remainder( !usePadding || !IsPadded<MT>::value );
2858 
2859  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
2860  {
2861  const size_t jbegin( ( IsUpper<MT>::value )
2862  ?( ( IsStrictlyUpper<MT>::value ? i+1UL : i ) & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) )
2863  :( 0UL ) );
2864  const size_t jend ( ( IsLower<MT>::value )
2865  ?( IsStrictlyLower<MT>::value ? i : i+1UL )
2866  :( n_ ) );
2867  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( jbegin <= jend, "Invalid loop indices detected" );
2868 
2869  const size_t jpos( ( remainder )?( jend & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) ):( jend ) );
2870  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( !remainder || ( jend - ( jend % (SIMDSIZE) ) ) == jpos, "Invalid end calculation" );
2871 
2872  size_t j( jbegin );
2873 
2874  for( ; j<jpos; j+=SIMDSIZE ) {
2875  store( i, j, load(i,j) + (~rhs).load(i,j) );
2876  }
2877  for( ; remainder && j<jend; ++j ) {
2878  v_[i*NN+j] += (~rhs)(i,j);
2879  }
2880  }
2881 }

2907  v_[i*NN+element->index()] += element->value();

3498  BLAZE_STATIC_ASSERT( IsVectorizable<Type>::value || MM == M );
3499 
3500  if( m > M ) {
3501  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
3502  }
3503 
3504  if( n > N ) {
3505  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
3506  }
3507 
3508  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n; ++j ) {
3509  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m; ++i )
3510  v_[i+j*MM] = init;
3511 
3512  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
3513  for( size_t i=m; i<MM; ++i )
3514  v_[i+j*MM] = Type();
3515  }
3516  }
3517 
3518  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value ) {
3519  for( size_t j=n; j<N; ++j )
3520  for( size_t i=0UL; i<MM; ++i )
3521  v_[i+j*MM] = Type();
3522  }
3523 
3524  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
3525 }

3578  v_[i+j*MM] = element;

3597  }

4339 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
4340  , size_t M // Number of rows
4341  , size_t N > // Number of columns
4342 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side matrix
4343  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side matrix
4344 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::operator=( const Matrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
4345 {
4346  using blaze::assign;
4347 
4348  typedef TransExprTrait_<This> TT;
4349  typedef CTransExprTrait_<This> CT;
4350  typedef InvExprTrait_<This> IT;
4351 
4352  if( (~rhs).rows() > M || (~rhs).columns() > N ) {
4353  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid assignment to hybrid matrix" );
4354  }
4355 
4356  if( IsSame<MT,TT>::value && (~rhs).isAliased( this ) ) {
4357  transpose();
4358  }
4359  else if( IsSame<MT,CT>::value && (~rhs).isAliased( this ) ) {
4360  ctranspose();
4361  }
4362  else if( !IsSame<MT,IT>::value && (~rhs).canAlias( this ) ) {
4363  HybridMatrix tmp( ~rhs );
4364  resize( tmp.rows(), tmp.columns() );
4365  assign( *this, tmp );
4366  }
4367  else {
4368  resize( (~rhs).rows(), (~rhs).columns() );
4369  if( IsSparseMatrix<MT>::value )
4370  reset();
4371  assign( *this, ~rhs );
4372  }
4373 
4374  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
4375 
4376  return *this;
4377 }

4393 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
4394  , size_t M // Number of rows

4396 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side matrix
4397  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side matrix
4398 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::operator+=( const Matrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
4399 {
4400  using blaze::addAssign;
4401 
4402  if( (~rhs).rows() != m_ || (~rhs).columns() != n_ ) {
4403  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Matrix sizes do not match" );
4404  }
4405 
4406  if( (~rhs).canAlias( this ) ) {
4407  const ResultType_<MT> tmp( ~rhs );
4408  addAssign( *this, tmp );
4409  }
4410  else {
4411  addAssign( *this, ~rhs );

4433 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix

4436 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side matrix
4437  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side matrix
4438 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::operator-=( const Matrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
4439 {
4440  using blaze::subAssign;
4441 
4442  if( (~rhs).rows() != m_ || (~rhs).columns() != n_ ) {
4443  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Matrix sizes do not match" );

4445 
4446  if( (~rhs).canAlias( this ) ) {
4447  const ResultType_<MT> tmp( ~rhs );
4448  subAssign( *this, tmp );
4449  }
4450  else {
4451  subAssign( *this, ~rhs );
4452  }
4453 
4454  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
4455 
4456  return *this;
4457 }

4473 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
4474  , size_t M // Number of rows
4475  , size_t N > // Number of columns
4476 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side matrix
4477  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side matrix
4478 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::operator*=( const Matrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
4479 {
4480  if( n_ != (~rhs).rows() || (~rhs).columns() > N ) {
4481  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Matrix sizes do not match" );
4482  }
4483 
4484  const HybridMatrix tmp( *this * (~rhs) );
4485  this->operator=( tmp );
4486 
4487  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
4488 
4489  return *this;
4490 }

4810 void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::resize( size_t m, size_t n, bool preserve )
4811 {
4812  UNUSED_PARAMETER( preserve );
4813 
4814  if( m > M ) {
4815  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of rows for hybrid matrix" );
4816  }
4817 
4818  if( n > N ) {
4819  BLAZE_THROW_INVALID_ARGUMENT( "Invalid number of columns for hybrid matrix" );
4820  }
4821 
4822  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && m < m_ ) {
4823  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n; ++j )
4824  for( size_t i=m; i<m_; ++i )
4825  v_[i+j*MM] = Type();
4826  }
4827 
4828  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && n < n_ ) {
4829  for( size_t j=n; j<n_; ++j )
4830  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i )
4831  v_[i+j*MM] = Type();
4832  }
4833 
4834  m_ = m;
4835  n_ = n;
4836 }

4881 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
4882  , size_t M // Number of rows
4883  , size_t N > // Number of columns
4884 inline HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>& HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::transpose()
4885 {
4886  using std::swap;
4887 
4888  if( m_ > N || n_ > M ) {
4889  BLAZE_THROW_LOGIC_ERROR( "Impossible transpose operation" );
4890  }
4891 
4892  const size_t maxsize( max( m_, n_ ) );
4893  for( size_t j=1UL; j<maxsize; ++j ) {
4894  for( size_t i=0UL; i<j; ++i ) {
4895  swap( v_[i+j*MM], v_[j+i*MM] );
4896  }
4897  }
4898 
4899  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && n_ < m_ ) {
4900  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j ) {
4901  for( size_t i=n_; i<m_; ++i ) {
4902  v_[i+j*MM] = Type();
4903  }
4904  }
4905  }
4906 
4907  if( IsVectorizable<Type>::value && n_ > m_ ) {
4908  for( size_t j=m_; j<n_; ++j ) {
4909  for( size_t i=0UL; i<m_; ++i ) {
4910  v_[i+j*MM] = Type();
4911  }
4912  }
4913  }
4914 
4915  swap( m_, n_ );
4916 
4917  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( isIntact(), "Invariant violation detected" );
4918 
4919  return *this;
4920 }

4941 {

4945  BLAZE_THROW_LOGIC_ERROR( "Impossible transpose operation" );

4955

4968  }
4969  }
4970  }
4971 
4972  swap( m_, n_ );
4973

5013 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
5014  , size_t M // Number of rows
5015  , size_t N > // Number of columns
5016 inline void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::swap( HybridMatrix& m ) noexcept
5017 {
5018  using std::swap;
5019 
5020  const size_t maxrows( max( m_, m.m_ ) );
5021  const size_t maxcols( max( n_, m.n_ ) );
5022 
5023  for( size_t j=0UL; j<maxcols; ++j ) {
5024  for( size_t i=0UL; i<maxrows; ++i ) {
5025  swap( v_[i+j*MM], m(i,j) );
5026  }
5027  }
5028 
5029  swap( m_, m.m_ );
5030  swap( n_, m.n_ );
5031 }

5236 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
5237  , size_t M // Number of rows
5238  , size_t N > // Number of columns
5239 inline bool HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::isIntact() const noexcept
5240 {
5241  if( m_ > M || n_ > N )
5242  return false;
5243 
5244  if( IsNumeric<Type>::value )
5245  {
5246  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j ) {
5247  for( size_t i=m_; i<MM; ++i ) {
5248  if( v_[i+j*MM] != Type() )
5249  return false;
5250  }
5251  }
5252 
5253  for( size_t j=n_; j<N; ++j ) {
5254  for( size_t i=0UL; i<MM; ++i ) {
5255  if( v_[i+j*MM] != Type() )
5256  return false;
5257  }
5258  }
5259  }
5260 
5261  return true;
5262 }

5500 
5501  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( i < m_, "Invalid row access index" );
5502  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( i + SIMDSIZE <= MM, "Invalid row access index" );
5503  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( !usePadding || i % SIMDSIZE == 0UL, "Invalid row access index" );
5504  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( j < n_, "Invalid column access index" );
5505  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( checkAlignment( &v_[i+j*MM] ), "Invalid alignment detected" );
5506 
5507  storea( &v_[i+j*MM], value );
5508 }

5606  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::assign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO>& rhs )

5620 //*************************************************************************************************
5632 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
5633  , size_t M // Number of rows
5634  , size_t N > // Number of columns
5635 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side dense matrix
5636  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side dense matrix
5637 inline EnableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAssign<MT> >
5638  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::assign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
5639 {
5640  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_BE_VECTORIZABLE_TYPE( Type );
5641 
5642  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
5643 
5644  constexpr bool remainder( !usePadding || !IsPadded<MT>::value );
5645 
5646  const size_t ipos( ( remainder )?( m_ & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) ):( m_ ) );
5647  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( !remainder || ( m_ - ( m_ % (SIMDSIZE) ) ) == ipos, "Invalid end calculation" );
5648 
5649  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
5650  {
5651  size_t i( 0UL );
5652 
5653  for( ; i<ipos; i+=SIMDSIZE ) {
5654  store( i, j, (~rhs).load(i,j) );
5655  }
5656  for( ; remainder && i<m_; ++i ) {
5657  v_[i+j*MM] = (~rhs)(i,j);
5658  }
5659  }
5660 }

5680 template< typename MT > // Type of the right-hand side sparse matrix
5681 inline void HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::assign( const SparseMatrix<MT,true>& rhs )
5682 {
5683  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
5684 
5685  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
5686  for( ConstIterator_<MT> element=(~rhs).begin(j); element!=(~rhs).end(j); ++element )
5687  v_[element->index()+j*MM] = element->value();
5688 }

5735 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
5736  , size_t M // Number of rows
5737  , size_t N > // Number of columns
5738 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side dense matrix
5739  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side dense matrix
5740 inline DisableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAddAssign<MT> >
5741  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::addAssign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
5742 {
5743  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
5744 
5745  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
5746  {
5747  if( IsDiagonal<MT>::value )
5748  {
5749  v_[j+j*MM] += (~rhs)(j,j);
5750  }
5751  else
5752  {
5753  const size_t ibegin( ( IsLower<MT>::value )
5754  ?( IsStrictlyLower<MT>::value ? j+1UL : j )
5755  :( 0UL ) );
5756  const size_t iend ( ( IsUpper<MT>::value )
5757  ?( IsStrictlyUpper<MT>::value ? j : j+1UL )
5758  :( m_ ) );
5759  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( ibegin <= iend, "Invalid loop indices detected" );
5760 
5761  for( size_t i=ibegin; i<iend; ++i ) {
5762  v_[i+j*MM] += (~rhs)(i,j);
5763  }
5764  }
5765  }
5766 }

5783 template< typename Type // Data type of the matrix
5784  , size_t M // Number of rows
5785  , size_t N > // Number of columns
5786 template< typename MT // Type of the right-hand side dense matrix
5787  , bool SO > // Storage order of the right-hand side dense matrix
5788 inline EnableIf_<typename HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::BLAZE_TEMPLATE VectorizedAddAssign<MT> >
5789  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::addAssign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
5790 {
5791  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_BE_VECTORIZABLE_TYPE( Type );
5792  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_NOT_BE_DIAGONAL_MATRIX_TYPE( MT );
5793 
5794  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( (~rhs).rows() == m_ && (~rhs).columns() == n_, "Invalid matrix size" );
5795 
5796  constexpr bool remainder( !usePadding || !IsPadded<MT>::value );
5797 
5798  for( size_t j=0UL; j<n_; ++j )
5799  {
5800  const size_t ibegin( ( IsLower<MT>::value )
5801  ?( ( IsStrictlyLower<MT>::value ? j+1UL : j ) & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) )
5802  :( 0UL ) );
5803  const size_t iend ( ( IsUpper<MT>::value )
5804  ?( IsStrictlyUpper<MT>::value ? j : j+1UL )
5805  :( m_ ) );
5806  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( ibegin <= iend, "Invalid loop indices detected" );
5807 
5808  const size_t ipos( ( remainder )?( iend & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) ):( iend ) );
5809  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( !remainder || ( iend - ( iend % (SIMDSIZE) ) ) == ipos, "Invalid end calculation" );
5810 
5811  size_t i( ibegin );
5812 
5813  for( ; i<ipos; i+=SIMDSIZE ) {
5814  store( i, j, load(i,j) + (~rhs).load(i,j) );
5815  }
5816  for( ; remainder && i<iend; ++i ) {
5817  v_[i+j*MM] += (~rhs)(i,j);
5818  }
5819  }
5820 }

5949  HybridMatrix<Type,M,N,true>::subAssign( const DenseMatrix<MT,SO>& rhs )
5950 {
5951  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_BE_VECTORIZABLE_TYPE( Type );
5952  BLAZE_CONSTRAINT_MUST_NOT_BE_DIAGONAL_MATRIX_TYPE( MT );

5957

5960  const size_t ibegin( ( IsLower<MT>::value )
5961  ?( ( IsStrictlyLower<MT>::value ? j+1UL : j ) & size_t(-SIMDSIZE) )
5962  :( 0UL ) );
5963  const size_t iend ( ( IsUpper<MT>::value )
5964  ?( IsStrictlyUpper<MT>::value ? j : j+1UL )
5965  :( m_ ) );
5966  BLAZE_INTERNAL_ASSERT( ibegin <= iend, "Invalid loop indices detected" );
